channel.title: Pvp combat doesnt work at all! please help!
channel.description:
Hey everybody i need help getting pvp combat to work, there are hot zones all over the place, plus bounty hunter and wilderness pking... mage is the only form of pvp combat that you can use! please help! :confused: :confused: :confused:
NOTE: i am using abbyscap3 source!
